alert.note: Alert for Baxter; Cleburne; Eastern, Central, and Southern Searcy County Higher Elevations; Izard; Stone (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 14 at 10:14PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Stone, east central Searcy, southwestern Izard, north central Cleburne and south central Baxter Counties through 1045 PM CDT... At 1014 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Blanchard Springs Campground to near Clinton. Movement was east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Mountain View... Thola... Brandenberg... Herpel... Blanchard Springs Campground... Guion... Allison... Alco... Parma... Hanover... Rushing... Turkey Creek... Mt Olive in Izard County... Landis... Timbo... Gunner Pool Campground... Barkshed Campground... Woodrow... Newnata... Prim... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 200 AM CDT for north central Arkansas.

area.areaDesc: Baxter; Cleburne; Eastern, Central, and Southern Searcy County Higher Elevations; Izard; Stone
